results.title: Metformin restores electrophysiology of small conductance calcium-activated potassium channels in the atrium of GK diabetic rats
results.text_hl: Recently, the anti-@<m>DISEASE_212500</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:212500 @@@arrhythmic@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been gradually recognized.
